alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 1:47PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kauai in Kauai County through 215 PM HST... At 146 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poipu, or 9 miles southwest of Lihue, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lihue, Kalaheo, Hanapepe, Omao, North Fork Wailua Trails, Koloa, Poipu, Lawai, Wailua Homesteads, Puhi, Hanamaulu, Wailua River State Park and Eleele. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest
